name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptway - Supercharge Prompts as You Type

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Promptway is an expert at redesigning your prompts when using ChatGPT. It knows what you want the reply to look like.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How much time do you waste asking GPT or an LLM to fix it's own mistakes? Promptway helps stop them from making mistakes.

Need to boost SEO with blog titles? Just start writing.
Not enough time to write that cold email? Just start writing.
Learn something really quick? Just start writing.

Write. Redesigns your prompt. Hit tab to accept. Valuable and accurate response in milliseconds.
